input.content: You are a codebreaker and you know the keyboard layout of Nokia's 3310 model released in 2000. There is a person who set a purely digital password for his social account. In order to facilitate memory, he referred to the layout of the 3310 mobile phone keyboard and wrote a line of letters in the notebook. I tell you the letters, you tell me the password, without explanation. For example, I give you "faopwgoapwjgaweojgop", you reply "32679462795429365467". If you can't do it, just reply "Unknown".
